article.headline: Robert Morris 77, Sacred Heart 74
article.story: CORAOPOLIS, Pa. (AP) -- Chaz McCrommon scored 23 points and had 11 rebounds to lead Robert Morris to a 77-74 victory over Sacred Heart Saturday night. With the Colonials trailing 68-64, McCrommon scored eight consecutive points over the next 2½ minutes to give the Colonials (13-14, 10-7 Northeast Conference) a 72-68 advantage. The Pioneers (4-22, 3-14) used an early 15-0 run to take a 19-7 lead, but the Colonials answered with a 19-5 run of their own. There were 11 lead changes and 11 ties in the contest. McCrommon, a senior on Senior Night at the Sewell Center, went 11-for-11 from the free throw line. Fellow senior Maurice Carter had 12 points, as did freshman Beau Gibb. Robert Morris converted 22-of-24 free throws. Kibwe Trim had 21 points and nine rebounds to lead the Pioneers, while Joey Henley and Drew Shubik each added 12 and Mike Parker 11 points and seven assists.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
